import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import AddModal from '../AddModal/AddModal'; import Navbar from '../Navbar'; import getCroppedImg64 from '../getImage64'; import Cropper from 'react-easy-crop'; import CustomCheckbox from '../CustomCheckbox'; import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; function Student() { const { id } = useParams(); useEffect(() => { window.scrollTo(0, 0); }, []); const [phoneNumber, setPhoneNumber] = useState(''); const handleChange = event => { let value = event.target.value; if (!value.startsWith('+')) { value = '+' + value; } // Обновляем состояние setPhoneNumber(value); }; console.log(id); const [student, setStudent] = useState(null); console.log(student); useEffect(() => { const fetchData = async () => { try { const response = await fetch(`http://172.20.10.5:4000/service/only/${id}`); if (!response.ok) { throw new Error('Network response was not ok'); } const data = await response.json(); setStudent(data); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching data:', error); } }; fetchData(); return () => {}; }, []); return ( <>
